attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
TV companies' fraudulent use of phone - ins is now in the open.

TV companies making revenue by using premium-rate numbers is outside their articles of association/incorporation.  They are acting ultra vires , ie, illegally, even if the competitions were fair.

An outright ban on all premium-rate phone numbers would stop the scams.

rejection.details: The title must be a call for action and not your name
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
